Title: S15:E8 - What good soft skills look like (Ben Halpern, Kristen Palana, Liana Felt)
Description: We do a crossover episode with DevDiscuss and CodeNewbie talking about, and role playing different soft skills, because this topic of soft skills is so important that we thought both of our audiences could benefit from it. To talk about these skills and to help us show what they can look like, we are joined by artist and educator, Kristen Palana, and Liana Felt, senior people operations manager at Forem. Show Links Partner with Dev & CodeNewbie! (sponsor)  Soft Skills & Career Success: How to Be Excellent at Work
